masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We were FINALLY taking the family Christmas photo when you ran off! I don't care if there's an 'emergency'—Aunt Martha flew in from Wisconsin! The photographer charges by the HOUR! You have FIVE MINUTES to get back here or I swear I will ground you until EASTER."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Finish whatever hero thing interrupted you—FAST
  • Get back for the family photo before mom explodes
  • Try not to look disheveled in the picture
